institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 24 (Occupation Council Registration and Procedures)
contents: Article 24 (Registration and procedures of occupational council) ① The occupational council shall name itself ‘Skill Competition ○○○○ Occupational Council’ and apply for registration in accordance with the procedures set by the Korean Committee. The Korean Committee shall review the bylaws, etc. Approval can be decided., ② The following documents must be submitted in the registration application: 1. Registration application (Form No. 1 attached), 2. Council introduction (council purpose, council member requirements, etc.), 3. Registration status of council members (list of executives and members, member distribution status by region), 4. All regulations such as bylaws, 5. Other documents recognized by the Chairman of the Korean Council as necessary for registration of the council, ③ The Occupational Council shall provide information on the occupation in relation to the skill competition. Only a single council representing a profession is approved for registration, and multiple councils for that occupation are not recognized. However, due to the nature of the occupation, for similar occupations, two or more occupations can be combined to apply for registration as a single council., ④ A certificate of registration (Form No. 2 attached) is issued to the approved occupation council., ⑤ The occupation council has the purpose and If it is deemed to be in violation of its functions or is being operated inappropriately, the Skills Competition Deliberation Committee may cancel the registration of the relevant council. Revised 2021. 1. 8.
